title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message:
Just got this one today. Turns on, chimes but I get no video. I can see the backlight turning on but the screen remains dark. Any idea on what is going on with this one?
There is no sign of water damage.

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: Voltage on pin 4 from J9000????

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: I get nothing, 0V

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: Check L9008, i bet it is open......

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: L9008 measures 0 ohms

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: I also get 0V on pin 1-3 on U9000 so I guess the problem lays earlier in the circuit.

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: Sorry, my bad, I get 3,3v on pin1-3 on U9000

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: did you measure voltage on both sides of L9008?? I still think  L9008 is bad or broken trace....

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: Yes, but what I am missing is PP3V3_S0

message: do you have voltage on any pin of L9008??

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: Something is trolling me here, now I suddenly get 3.3 on either side of L9008

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: Okei, I'm getting really confused here. A minute ago I could swear I got 3.3 on pin one of U9000. I probably did something wrong. It seems pin one of U9000 is my main issue at the moment, I get 0V here

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: Check L9080, 2 coils on 1 package...

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: Yes, that was my next move

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: have you inspected lvds connector closely?? Your tests are with known working screen and lvds cable??

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: Yes the LVDS connector at least looks fine. I have now replaced L9004, L9008 and L9080 with no luck. I have tried three different displays with three different cables. Maybe I should try to replace the LVDS connector next just in case?

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: And I do have voltage on pin 2, 3 and 4 on J9000

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: Are you using a proper LCD or that LP133WX2-TLGV junk?

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: I only have original screens.

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 Chimes, backlight on but screen remains black/dark grey
message: So I have an update here, even if it showed no sign of damage at all it was the LVDS connector itself, replaced it and all good :). Thank you for putting me in the right direction.
